Now, tnenenone. in exercise of the powers conferred by clause (l) of

I . Short title rrtd commencement.{ 1) 1'his Ordinance may be called
the Capital DevelopmentAuthority (Amcndment) Ordinance, 201 8-
(2) It shall corne into force at once.
2. Amendment of scction 6, Ordinance XXIII of 1960.-ln the
Capital Development Authorit- Ordinance, 1960 (XXIII of 1960)' hereinafter called
as the said Ordinance, in section 6--
(a) in sub-section (2), after the word "membef', the expression "Who are
civil servants in BS-20 and above" shall be inserted;
(b) for sub-section (3), the following shall be substituted, namely:-
"(3) The Chairman and other members shall, unless sooner removed
for reasons to be recorded in writing, hold olIice for a period of
three years."; and
(c) for sub-section (6),1hc .'.'lowing shail he substituted, namely:-
"(6) A member, whc is not a civil servant ofthe Federal Govemment,
may at any time in writing underhis hand addressed to the Federal
Govemment resign:
Provided that his resignation shall not take effect until accepted
by the Federal Govemment.".
3. Amendment of section 8, Ordinance XXIII of 1960.-In the said
Ordinance, in section 8, clause (f) shall be omitted.
MAMNOON HUSSAIN,
